XPS_Collection
Description

HashMapObject which stores items which match <AllowedTypes> array

Inherits

none

Interfaces

XPS_ICollection

Hashmapobject Flags

none

Example
_myCollection = createhashmapobject [XPS_typ_Collection];
Author

CrashDome

Types
XPS_typ_Collection
Functions
#create
Parameters
_allowedTypes (optional)

Array - in the same format as the Params command - i.e. ["",[],objNull,0]

RegisterType
Parameters
_type

<Type> - used to add a type after object creation. In shorthand - i.e. [] or objNull or 0 or createhashmap, etc..

AddItem
Parameters
RemoveItem
Parameters
